prompt: Generate diverse and realistic customer feedback text that expresses negative sentiment. The feedback should convey dissatisfaction, frustration, or disappointment with a product, service, or experience. Include a wide range of contexts such as online shopping, restaurant visits, customer support interactions, app usage, travel experiences, or subscription services. Use varied tones (e.g., angry, sarcastic, disappointed, formal, passive-aggressive) and lengths (from short complaints to detailed critical reviews). Incorporate different perspectives, such as feedback from younger or older customers, or from different cultural backgrounds. Include subtle or nuanced negativity (e.g., mild frustration or polite criticism) alongside strong complaints. Examples could include criticism of poor quality, delays, unhelpful staff, technical issues, misleading advertising, or unpleasant experiences.
response:
The dress I ordered arrived two weeks late and looked nothing like the picture online. 

I can’t believe how rude the staff were during my visit; I won’t be coming back.

The app crashes every time I try to use it, making it completely useless.

I was really disappointed with the quality of the food; it didn't taste fresh at all.

My subscription was charged twice this month, and customer support was no help at all.

The flight was delayed for hours, and we received no updates from the airline.

I expected more from a five-star restaurant, but the service was slow and inattentive.

I thought this gadget would work as advertised, but it barely functions.

The hotel room was dirty, and I had to ask multiple times for basic amenities.

I’m frustrated that the online order system keeps malfunctioning. 

The product arrived damaged, and returning it has been a nightmare.

The staff seemed completely uninterested in helping me with my issue; very disappointing.

I was overcharged for my meal, and the manager was dismissive about it.

I can't believe they advertised free shipping, yet I was charged at checkout.

The online course was poorly structured and not worth the money I spent.

The coffee tasted burnt, and the barista didn’t seem to care about my feedback.

I waited on hold for over an hour just to get disconnected; what a waste of time!

The service at the restaurant was so slow I almost left before ordering.

The furniture I ordered came with missing parts, and it took forever to get a response.

I found the website confusing and difficult to navigate; it felt like a chore to shop.

My experience with customer support was frustrating; they didn’t understand my issue.

The TV I bought has a terrible picture quality, and the warranty is useless.

I had to wait two weeks for my refund, and nobody could provide an update.

The concert venue was overcrowded, and the staff were unhelpful.

I was promised a discount that never applied at checkout; very misleading.

The app is so buggy that I can't rely on it for anything anymore.

I was disappointed with the selection of items; it didn’t match what was advertised.

The room I booked online was not available when I arrived, which was unacceptable.

My last order was incorrect, and I had to drive back to the store to fix it.

The ride-sharing service took forever to arrive, and the driver was rude.

I had a terrible experience with the rental car; it was dirty and smelled bad.

The dessert I ordered was stale, and the server didn’t offer any apology.

I felt completely ignored during my visit; it was as if I wasn’t even there.

The software update made my device slower instead of fixing the previous bugs.

The tour guide was unenthusiastic and made the experience less enjoyable.

My online purchase took weeks to arrive, and the tracking was inaccurate.

The product didn’t match its description, and I feel cheated.

I tried to cancel my subscription, but the process was unnecessarily complicated.

The food was cold when it finally arrived at my table, and it wasn’t even busy.

The customer service representative was not only unhelpful but also condescending.

I was misled by the flashy advertising, and now I regret my purchase.

The experience was underwhelming; I expected much more from such a popular place.

I found the checkout process frustratingly slow and outdated.

The staff were dismissive of my concerns, leaving me feeling frustrated.

The delivery was late, and the package was damaged upon arrival.

I can’t believe how bad the internet connection was during my stay; it was a nightmare.

I’m disappointed that my favorite item was out of stock after searching for it.

The quality of the product is far below my expectations; I won’t recommend it.
